The statement made by U: S. Sen. Marco Rubio, R-Fla., on Face the Nation regarding the increasing number of Americans identifying as pro-life.
The change in responses from Gallup: s polling data, showing an increase in the percentage of Americans identifying as "pro-life" and a decrease in those identifying as "pro-choice."
